About

Finding vulnerabilities before the adversaries do

Bio

I'm a security researcher specializing in web application security, network penetration testing, and vulnerability research. With 6+ years of experience breaking into systems ethically.

My work spans from discovering critical CVEs in popular software to conducting comprehensive security assessments for Fortune 500 companies. I believe in responsible disclosure and making the internet safer, one bug at a time.

Expertise

• Web Application Security

• Network Penetration Testing

• Vulnerability Research

• Exploit Development

• Binary Analysis

• Reverse Engineering

• API Security Testing

• Cloud Security (AWS/GCP)

Tools

Burp Suite, Metasploit, Nmap, Wireshark, Ghidra, IDA Pro, SQLMap, OWASP ZAP, Cobalt Strike, Bloodhound

Certifications

OSCP (Offensive Security Certified Professional) • OSWE (Web Expert) • CEH (Certified Ethical Hacker) • GXPN (GIAC Exploit Researcher) • Bug Bounty Hunter (HackerOne, Bugcrowd)

Security Research

Critical vulnerabilities discovered and responsibly disclosed

01

2024

CVE-2024-XXXXX - Remote Code Execution in Enterprise CMS →

Discovered critical RCE vulnerability affecting 50,000+ installations. Chained SQL injection with deserialization flaw to achieve remote code execution. Awarded $15,000 bounty and CVE credit. Worked with vendor for responsible 90-day disclosure.

RCE CVE Published CVSS 9.8

02

2023

Authentication Bypass in Mobile Banking App →

Identified logic flaw in JWT implementation allowing full account takeover. Exploited weak token validation to bypass MFA and access sensitive financial data. Patched within 48 hours affecting 2M+ users.

Auth Bypass JWT Exploitation Hall of Fame

Severity

High

Bounty

$10,000

Platform

Bugcrowd

03

2023

XSS to Account Takeover Chain in SaaS Platform →

Chained stored XSS with CSRF to achieve full account takeover. Exploited DOM-based vulnerability in admin panel to extract session tokens. Demonstrated impact on enterprise customers with proof-of-concept.

XSS CSRF Chain Patched

Severity

High

Bounty

$8,500

Platform

Private Program

04

2022

AWS S3 Misconfiguration Research →

Conducted large-scale reconnaissance identifying 200+ misconfigured S3 buckets exposing PII. Automated scanning framework detected open buckets, weak permissions, and data exposure. Responsibly reported to affected organizations.

Cloud Security Automation Data Exposure
